references.paper_title: On Evaluation of Embodied Navigation Agents
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of embodied navigation, providing a benchmark for evaluating agents' performance.

references.paper_title: ObjectNav Revisited: On Evaluation of Embodied Agents Navigating to Objects
references.reason: It advanced the ObjectNav task by focusing on locating specific instances instead of just categories, making it more relevant to real-world scenarios.

references.paper_title: GOAT-Bench: A Benchmark for Multi-Modal Lifelong Navigation
references.reason: This paper introduced the GOAT-Bench benchmark, which is directly built upon in this paper's proposed CoIN-Bench.

references.paper_title: Alexa Arena: A User-Centric Interactive Platform for Embodied AI
references.reason: It presented a platform for human-agent interaction research, informing this paper's design for collaborative navigation.

references.paper_title: FindThis: Language-Driven Object Disambiguation in Indoor Environments
references.reason: This work addressed the issue of object disambiguation through dialogue, a key challenge that the current paper also tackles.
